    • Package quizlogic

      • Klasse quizlogic.DataTransportObject

        class DataTransportObject extends Object implements Serializable
        serialVersionUID:
        1L

        • Serialisierte Felder

          • id
            int id
            The unique identifier for the entity this DTO represents.

            A default of -1 indicates the entity is new and has not yet been persisted.
